item.title: CTF DC-1
item.description: http://www.five86.com/dc-1.html Warning: Contains spoilers for this CTF Times Start time: ~19:00 04/27/2019 End time: ~11:00 04/28/2018 I did get some sleep between the two days ;) Background My first CTF on my own! I’m part of a group of developers at Credit Karma, where I currently work, who voluntarily participate in security trainings where we learn offensive security techniques from our AppSec team. We’ve done individual challenges, like executing a XSS on a vulnerable form or performing SQLi to change a password on a vulnerable website, but I’ve never done a CTF before.
